page.title: 16HOUSING
page.content: This is a region of suburban develop ment providing predominantly private housing.There are 2 main areas;Green Lane and Finham wedges, developed largely during the 1960's of which the former consists of terraced and semi- detached properties and the latter of semis and detached houses.The S.E.area of Stivichall contains semis, terraced and flat dwellings, some council owned together with old peoples' bungalows.The S.W. area of Willenhall is basically of maisonette and terraced homes privately owned and with a substantial retired population.Baginton has a longer and more varied history of expansion to some extent dependent on Coventry. To early agricultural houses bungalows have been added (1920's)and later terraced and detached residences in- cluding 'The Mews'.
